pageContent: Objectives: To analyze the validity of the ratio between the second and fourth finger (digit ratio; 2D/4D) of the left hand as a predictor for prostate cancer (PCa) in a group of men undergoing prostate biopsy.

metaData.source:
Editorial Comment to Urethra-sparing high-intensity focused ultrasound for localized prostate cancer: Functional and oncological outcomes
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26248507/
